typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SNo as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		unitprice as integer,
		Color as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		PSG_Key as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		unitprice as integer,
		Color as string,
		current_flag as integer,
		inserted_date as date,
		Lastupdate_date as date,
		PHASHkey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1 derive(SCDHash = md5(iif(isNull(Name),'',toString(Name))
+ iif(isNull(ProductNumber),'',toString(ProductNumber))
+ iif(isNull(unitprice),'',toString(unitprice))
+ iif(isNull(Color),'',toString(Color))
)) ~> Hash
Hash, source2 exists(SCDHash == PHASHkey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Exists, source2 lookup(source1@ProductID == source2@ProductID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(current_flag),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRow, UpdateRow)
ConditionalSplit1@NewRow derive(current_flag = 1,
		inserted_date = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn1
ConditionalSplit1@UpdateRow, source2 exists(ConditionalSplit1@UpdateRow@ProductID == source2@ProductID &&
(
ConditionalSplit1@UpdateRow@PHASHkey != source2@PHASHkey
),
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		PSG_Key as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		unitprice as integer,
		Color as string,
		current_flag as integer,
		inserted_date as date,
		Lastupdate_date as date,
		PHASHkey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		PSG_Key,
		ProductID = ConditionalSplit1@NewRow@ProductID,
		Name = ConditionalSplit1@NewRow@Name,
		ProductNumber = ConditionalSplit1@NewRow@ProductNumber,
		unitprice = ConditionalSplit1@NewRow@unitprice,
		Color = ConditionalSplit1@NewRow@Color,
		current_flag,
		inserted_date,
		Lastupdate_date,
		PHASHkey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
